creator: mveygman@hotmail.com
text:
In my work I have come into a necessity of having Apache being able to add 
Virtual Hosts Conditionally upon them being online, i.e. Directories 
responsible for Content being mounted.  This is extremely useful when dealing 
with Hardware Clustering Technologies.

Unfortunately I haven't been able to find any way of doing so and I thought to 
make a suggestiong of a directive <IfExists directory> </IfExists> to make this 
possible.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
That would imply a directory watch or the like. Please remember, the httpd.conf
is not a program.
There are several other ways to achieve the things, e.g. dynamic mod_perl
configuration (<Perl>), mod_vdbh, or just simple Wildcard Include directives.

Thanks for using Apache.
